thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com | 3 of 907
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: the site works and is painless to use. Something about the site's appearance is unappealing to me in some way. I'm not sure what it is though. I prefer dark color schemes, so it isn't that. I think all the necessary information is clearly displayed. It seems busy, but it really isn't. I think it might be the mash up of different thumbnails to navigate to different bundles. It's jumbly and clashing and a mixed bag of different styles and colors. I think that might be it. All in all, not a big deal. I don't go to BS to relax my eyes after all.
